_header: Of a man Mathew thought / Though he the wineyard wroght
_description: The Parable of the Labourers in the Vineyard — five 12-line stanzas (aabaabccbccb)

BLHar2253.First Lines:
Of a mon matheu þohteþo he þe wynȝord
                    wrohte…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…ant saide he come wel ȝoreant gonne is loue for
                    lete
